mapper.insert: insert into tb_pbar_album (pbarId, albumId, createTime) values (#{pbarId}, #{albumId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT ta.id, ta.title, ta.msg, ta.imageUrl, ta.picNum, tu.id AS userId, tu.userPic, tu.avater, tu.name AS userName, ta.music, ta.createTime, tpa.createTime AS publishTime FROM tb_pbar_album tpa JOIN tb_album ta ON tpa.albumId = ta.id JOIN tb_user tu ON ta.userId = tu.id WHERE tpa.pbarId = #{pbarId} AND ta.isdel = 0 ORDER BY tpa.createTime LIMIT #{page}, 10;
